item.title: Welcome message doesn't change..?
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

well theres your problem bro that 16 in the thing is suppose to be 18… lol the most up to date, which is where you should be… unless you never updated your jdk… so change to 18 and try bro…

from this:
jdk1.6.0_16

to this:
jdk1.6.0_18

hope it works bro…

item.title: Welcome message doesn't change..?
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

[quote=“mangalover51, post:10, topic:334593”]try mine bro…

@echo off title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]
Whoaa. Haha. What do I change to make it fit my stuff?
This was my old code.

@echo off Title Compiler cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome message doesn't change..?
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

Number one questions that is pissing me off soooooo much…
This is what it SHOULD say when I first log in…

{ sM("Test"); sM("Test"); sM("Test"); sM("Test"); sM("Test"); sM("Enjoy!"); appendConnected(); }
Instead… it still shows this…?

Why…? I’m not understanding what the problem is…
The code changes… but not in game…
And yes I’ve compiled… -.-

Read full topic
